introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: What is Height Calculator
introduce.label: Introduction
introduce.description: Height Calculator is a free, easy-to-use online height tool focused on speed, accuracy, and readability. Whether it's cm to ft/in conversion, child height prediction, height percentile lookup, or growth charts, the Height Calculator can instantly complete calculations and displays in your browser. The Height Calculator prioritizes privacy, doesn't collect personal information, helping families, coaches, and students intuitively understand height, growth, and percentile concepts for clearer decision-making.

items.title: Ready-to-Use Conversion
items.description: Use the Height Calculator for real-time bidirectional conversion between centimeters and feet/inches, supporting decimal feet and feet+inches display.

items.title: Reference-Based Prediction
items.description: The Height Calculator provides adult height estimation based on parental height and common growth references, suitable for boys and girls.

items.title: Percentiles & Charts
items.description: In the Height Calculator, query height percentiles by age and gender, and track trends with charts.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Height Calculator
faq.description: Answers to common questions about Height Calculator, unit conversion, height prediction, and percentiles.

items.title: How accurate is child height prediction?
items.description: Height Calculator uses common mid-parental height method and growth references for estimation. Height Calculator results are for educational and planning reference, not medical advice.

items.title: Can I convert centimeters to feet and inches?
items.description: Yes. Height Calculator supports instant conversion between centimeters and feet/inches, outputting both decimal feet and feet+inches formats.

items.title: Do you save my data?
items.description: No. Height Calculator runs locally in the browser, doesn't store personal information, and requires no login.

items.title: Where do percentile references come from?
items.description: Height Calculator references common growth data for learning and education. For clinical judgment, please consult professionals.

items.title: Is Height Calculator free?
items.description: Yes. Height Calculator's core features are free to use with no registration required. Optional enhanced features may be offered later.

items.title: Can I compare multiple people's heights?
items.description: Yes. Height Calculator supports multi-object comparison, convenient for unified standards in families, classrooms, or training.
